replies.body: They dont perma ban 1st offence, it seem like you do this sort of thing quite often and just as bad or worst.
i havent been toxic for a few months now and thought i had mostly reformed i dont do it most games infact i dont really talk unless someone picks a fight with me in game

You may not have been toxic for a few months but it is likely that you have a history of negative attitude and behavior. Have you ever had any other type of punishment such as a chat restriction/14 day ban? Prolonged periods of negativity are just as bad as one-off occurences of extreme behaviour (such as inting, racsism, etc) and will eventually be punished with a permaban. 

While this chat log does not contain anything that immediately stands out (such as the typical encouragement of suicide, racism/sexism/homophobia/ableism), it shows you being a toxic player and contributing to a negative team environment, which is 100% punishable. 

If other players are "baiting you into fighting", simply mute them at the first hint they are trying to do this so you don't get triggered. Don't bother replying to them.
its more the fact that it was instant as soon as the game ended and not over a hour as if they looked at the report and just clicked ban with no regard for if the other person was in the wrong or not

The [instant feedback system is usually instant](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-) (or close to).
